casebody.data:
TOWNSHIP OF MOUNT HOLLY, NEW JERSEY, et al., petitioners,
v.
MT. HOLLY GARDENS CITIZENS IN ACTION, INC., et al. No. 11-1507. Supreme Court of the United States June 17, 2013.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.
